channel.title: Home appliances on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Home appliances on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 BSH Hausgeräte GmbH Logo
BSH Hausgeräte GmbH is the largest manufacturer of home appliances in Europe and one of the leading companies in the sector worldwide. The group stemmed from a joint venture set up in May 1967 between Robert Bosch GmbH and Siemens AG, and it posted annual sales of 13.9 billion euros in the year 2020. Today, BSH operates some 40 factories in Europe, the USA, Latin America and Asia. Together with a global network of sales, production, and service companies, the BSH conglomerate today is made up of about 80 companies in 50 countries, with a total workforce of about 60,000 people.
You can download theBSHlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: BSH
item.description: BSH Hausgeräte GmbH is the largest manufacturer of home appliances in Europe and one of the leading companies in the sector worldwide. The group stemmed from a joint venture set up in May 1967 between Robert Bosch GmbH and Siemens AG, and it posted annual sales of 13.9 billion euros in the year 2020. Today, BSH operates some 40 factories in Europe, the USA, Latin America and Asia. Together with a global network of sales, production, and service companies, the BSH conglomerate today is made up of about 80 companies in 50 countries, with a total workforce of about 60,000 people.
